overview: What do you get when you combine a sexy radio talk show host with a group of horny listeners? Find out as listeners call in with their wildest fantasies to a tongue-in-cheek radio show. From a sex-filled train robbery to a haunted house of pleasure to a rock n' roll radio station threesome, the callers won't let you down. Tune in now, the lines are open and the callers aren't the only ones talking dirty!
title: Indecent Radio
